qualifications_required: For Managers: Age not exceeding 35 years as on 01-05-2025 (relaxation up to 45 years based on experience). Minimum 7 years of experience in Housing Finance/Retail Lending/Marketing of Financial products. Presently holding a role equivalent to or above Assistant Manager. For Senior Managers: Age not exceeding 36 years as on 01-05-2025 (relaxation up to 45 years based on experience). Minimum 8 years of experience. Presently holding a role equivalent to or above Manager. Any Graduation (10+2+3 format) from UGC recognized university. Post-graduation & professional qualification preferred.
skills_required: Good communication skills (verbal and written), negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, leadership qualities, team management, multitasking ability, planning and organizing skills, target orientation, proficiency in MS-Office
age_limit: Managers: Not exceeding 35 years (relaxation up to 45). Senior Managers: Not exceeding 36 years (relaxation up to 45).
salary: Negotiable based on Current CTC + Attractive incentives
contact_details: The DGM (HR), Repco Home Finance Limited, 3rd Floor, Alexander Square, New No. 2/Old No. 34 & 35, Sardar Patel Road, Guindy, Chennai- 600032. Contact Number: 9962235359. Email: recruitment@repcohome.com
